segments.source_content: # Markdown Features

translations.zh-hant: # Markdown 功能

segments.source_content: import BrowserWindow from '@site/src/components/BrowserWindow';

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_623f74e7

segments.source_content: Docusaurus uses **[Markdown](https://commonmark.org/)** as its main content authoring format.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 採用 **[Markdown](https://commonmark.org/)** 作為主要內容編寫格式。

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Learn Markdown]

You can [learn Markdown in 10 minutes](https://commonmark.org/help/).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip[學習 Markdown]

您可以在 [10 分鐘內學會 Markdown](https://commonmark.org/help/)。

:::

segments.source_content: Docusaurus uses modern tooling to help you create **interactive documentation**.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 使用現代化工具協助您建立**互動式文檔**。

segments.source_content: The **[MDX](https://mdxjs.com/)** compiler transforms **Markdown files to React components**, and allows you to use JSX in your Markdown content. This enables you to easily interleave React components within your content, and create delightful learning experiences.

translations.zh-hant: **[MDX](https://mdxjs.com/)** 編譯器會將 **Markdown 文件轉換為 React 元件**，並允許您在 Markdown 內容中使用 JSX。這讓您能輕鬆地在內容中嵌入 React 元件，創造出色的學習體驗。

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Use the MDX Playground]

The **[MDX playground](https://mdxjs.com/playground/)** is your new best friend!

It is a very helpful debugging tool that shows how the MDX compiler transforms Markdown to React.

**Options**: select the right format (MDX or CommonMark) and the following plugins Docusaurus uses: `remark-gfm`, `remark-directive`, `rehype-raw`.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip[使用 MDX 遊樂場]

**[MDX 遊樂場](https://mdxjs.com/playground/)** 是您的新夥伴！

這個強大的除錯工具能顯示 MDX 編譯器如何將 Markdown 轉換為 React。

**選項**：選擇正確格式（MDX 或 CommonMark）及 Docusaurus 使用的以下插件：`remark-gfm`、`remark-directive`、`rehype-raw`。

:::

segments.source_content: ## MDX vs. CommonMark {#mdx-vs-commonmark}

translations.zh-hant: ## MDX 與 CommonMark 比較 {#mdx-vs-commonmark}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus compiles both `.md` and `.mdx` files to React components using the MDX compiler, but **the syntax can be interpreted differently** depending on your settings.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 使用 MDX 編譯器將 `.md` 和 `.mdx` 文件編譯為 React 元件，但**語法解析方式會根據設定而異**。

segments.source_content: The MDX compiler supports [2 formats](https://mdxjs.com/packages/mdx/#optionsformat):

translations.zh-hant: MDX 編譯器支援 [2 種格式](https://mdxjs.com/packages/mdx/#optionsformat)：

segments.source_content:
- The [MDX format](https://mdxjs.com/docs/what-is-mdx/): a powerful parser allowing the usage of JSX
- The [CommonMark format](https://commonmark.org/): a standard-compliant Markdown parser that does not allow the usage of JSX

translations.zh-hant:
- [MDX 格式](https://mdxjs.com/docs/what-is-mdx/)：支援 JSX 的強大解析器
- [CommonMark 格式](https://commonmark.org/)：符合標準的 Markdown 解析器，不支援 JSX

segments.source_content: By default, **Docusaurus v3 uses the MDX format for all files** (including `.md` files) for historical reasons.

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下，**Docusaurus v3 基於歷史原因對所有文件（包括 `.md` 文件）使用 MDX 格式**。

segments.source_content: It is possible to **opt-in for CommonMark** using the [`siteConfig.markdown.format`](../../api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#markdown) setting or the `mdx.format: md` front matter.

translations.zh-hant: 您可透過 [`siteConfig.markdown.format`](../../api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#markdown) 設定或 `mdx.format: md` 前置元數據**選擇啟用 CommonMark**。

segments.source_content:
:::tip[how to use CommonMark]

If you plan to use CommonMark, we recommend the [`siteConfig.markdown.format: 'detect'`](../../api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#markdown) setting. The appropriate format will be selected automatically, based on file extensions:

- `.md` files will use the CommonMark format
- `.mdx` files will use the MDX format

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip[如何使用 CommonMark]

若計劃使用 CommonMark，建議採用 [`siteConfig.markdown.format: 'detect'`](../../api/docusaurus.config.js.mdx#markdown) 設定。系統會根據副檔名自動選擇適當格式：

- `.md` 文件使用 CommonMark 格式
- `.mdx` 文件使用 MDX 格式

:::

segments.source_content: ## Standard features {#standard-features}

translations.zh-hant: ## 標準功能 {#standard-features}

segments.source_content: Markdown is a syntax that enables you to write formatted content in a readable syntax.

translations.zh-hant: Markdown 是一種讓您能以易讀語法編寫格式化內容的語法。

segments.source_content:
```md
### My Doc Section

Hello world message with some **bold** text, some _italic_ text, and a [link](/)

![img alt](/img/docusaurus.png)
```

segments.source_content:
```mdx-code-block

My Doc Section

Hello world message with some **bold** text, some _italic_ text and a [link](/) ![img alt](/img/docusaurus.png) ```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_1d510af2

segments.source_content: Markdown is declarative Some may assume a 1-1 correlation between Markdown and HTML, e.g., `![Preview](/img/docusaurus.png)` will always become ``, as-is. However, _that is not the case_. The Markdown syntax `![message](url)` only declaratively tells Docusaurus that an image needs to be inserted here, but we may do other things like transforming a [file path to URL path](./markdown-features-assets.mdx#images), so the generated markup may differ from the output of other Markdown renderers, or a naïve hand-transcription to the equivalent JSX/HTML code. In general, you should only assume the _semantics_ of the markup (` ``` ` fences become [code blocks](./markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx); `>` becomes [quotes](#quotes), etc.), but not the actual compiled output.

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5f852894

segments.source_content: ## Front matter {#front-matter}

translations.zh-hant: ## 前置元數據 {#front-matter}

segments.source_content: Front matter is used to add metadata to your Markdown file. All content plugins have their own front matter schema, and use the front matter to enrich the default metadata inferred from the content or other configuration.

translations.zh-hant: 前置元數據用於為 Markdown 文件添加元數據。所有內容插件都有各自的前置元數據結構，並利用這些數據來增強從內容或其他配置推斷出的預設元數據。

segments.source_content: Front matter is provided at the very top of the file, enclosed by three dashes `---`. The content is parsed as [YAML](https://yaml.org/spec/1.2.2/).

translations.zh-hant: 前置元數據位於文件頂部，由三個破折號 `---` 包圍。內容以 [YAML](https://yaml.org/spec/1.2.2/) 格式解析。

segments.source_content:
```md
---
title: My Doc Title
more_data:
  - Can be provided
  - as: objects
    or: arrays
---
```
